system.novice: Target cannot perform Reactions, +10 to Tests to dodge or parry target's attacks. Power can be sustained by devoting the first Half Action of the Navigators Turn to doing so.
system.adept: Effects of power extend Navigator's Willpower Bonus metres from target, effecting everyone in range that fails Opposed Willpower Test. Now +20 to tests to Dodge or Parry any affected target's attacks.
system.master: Anyone in the area that fails the Opposed Willpower Test is stunned for the first round of the effect's duration.
